claim_evidence: carefully collected and filtered web corpora can be as useful as newswire corpora of equivalent sizes
evidence: We have demonstrated that carefully collected and filtered web corpora can be as useful as newswire corpora of equivalent sizes .
text: We have demonstrated that carefully collected and filtered web corpora can be as useful as newswire corpora of equivalent sizes .

claim_evidence: for context-sensitive spelling correction the Web Corpus results are bet ter than using a search engine
evidence: We show that for context-sensitive spelling correction the Web Corpus results are bet ter than using a search engine .
text: We show that for context-sensitive spelling correction the Web Corpus results are bet ter than using a search engine .

claim_evidence: NLP algorithms tend to perform better when more data is availablestate-of-the-art results for many tasks will come from exploiting web text
evidence: As NLP algorithms tend to perform better when more data is available , we expect state-of-the-art results for many tasks will come from exploiting web text .
text: As NLP algorithms tend to perform better when more data is available , we expect state-of-the-art results for many tasks will come from exploiting web text .

evidence: Although the 10 billion words Web Corpus is smaller than the number of words indexed by search engines , better results have been achieved using the smaller collection .
text: Although the 10 billion words Web Corpus is smaller than the number of words indexed by search engines , better results have been achieved using the smaller collection .

evidence: In this paper , the accuracy of natural language application training on a 10 billion word Web Corpus is compared with other methods using search engine hit counts and corpora of printed text .
text: In this paper , the accuracy of natural language application training on a 10 billion word Web Corpus is compared with other methods using search engine hit counts and corpora of printed text .

evidence: Using the same framework describe here , it is possible to collect a much larger corpus of freely available web text than our 10 billion word corpus .
text: Using the same framework describe here , it is possible to collect a much larger corpus of freely available web text than our 10 billion word corpus .

evidence: While most previous work accesses web text through search engine hit counts , we created a Web Corpus by downloading web pages to create a topic-diverse collec tion of 10 billion words of English .
text: While most previous work accesses web text through search engine hit counts , we created a Web Corpus by downloading web pages to create a topic-diverse collec tion of 10 billion words of English .

evidence: In the context-sensitive spelling correction task , a simple memory-based learner trained on our Web Corpus achieved better results than method based on search engine queries .
text: In the context-sensitive spelling correction task , a simple memory-based learner trained on our Web Corpus achieved better results than method based on search engine queries .
